value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a .NET Core application to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of writing and replicating customized data to regions around the world with Azure Cosmos DB global distribution.

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: By using the Azure Cosmos DB Table API, you will benefit from the low latency, high availability, and scalability of Azure Cosmos DB in a Table storage application.

value.title: Using Entity Framework Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how to use Entity Framework (EF) Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB. EF Core is a lightweight, extensible, open source, and cross-platform version of the popular Entity Framework data access technology.  0:00 – Overview 1:43 – Using Entity Framework Core with
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FFgS_k_Muk8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Learn how to create and deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL for fully managed, enterprise-ready PostgreSQL database services.

value.title: Develop and configure an ASP.NET application that queries an Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Create an Azure SQL database to store data for an application, and create an ASP.NET application to query data from the database.

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: See Azure in action
value.excerpt: The demos in this module provide an opportunity to see Azure in action.

value.title: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Putting it all together with Azure SQL

value.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
value.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

value.title: Configure databases for performance
value.excerpt: Control database-level configuration options. Explore Intelligent Query Processing. Configure Open Source databases for optimum performance.

value.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

value.title: Describe performance-related maintenance tasks in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Implement tasks for both IaaS and PaaS to maintain indexes, and statistics. Explore the automatic tuning features of Azure SQL Database.

value.title: Introduction to implementing lambda architecture for IoT solutions
value.excerpt: An overview of the concepts and resources behind storage technologies used in IoT applications on Azure. After completing the module, you can determine when to use Blob storage, Data Lake storage, Azure Cosmos DB, and Time Series Insights.

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Persist and retrieve relational data with Entity Framework Core
value.excerpt: This module guides you through creating a data access project, connecting to a relational database, and writing CRUD queries.

value.title: Introduction to securing data at rest on Azure
value.excerpt: Identify the data in your organization and store it on Azure. Store secrets securely, and use client-side encryption and Storage Service Encryption to help protect your data.

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: 5 Things you didn't know about Azure SQL Database | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn about 5 things you didn't know about Azure SQL Database.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman
value.excerpt: Kirill Gavrylyuk stops by Azure Friday to talk Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman. Watch quick overview of the industry's first globally distributed multi-model database service followed by a demo of moving an existing MongoDB app to Cosmos DB with a single config change.  For more information, see: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/cosmos-db/.

value.excerpt: Aravind Krishna stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman and take a look at common design patterns for building highly scalable solutions with Azure Cosmos DB. value.excerpt: Carey MacDonald stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about Azure Cosmos DB, a managed database service with unlimited horizontal scale, allowing you to scale storage and throughput independently. value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to setup Azure Cosmos DB database for your Node application. value.title: Automate tasks in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Scripting repetitive tasks in Azure SQL for regular maintenance jobs and multi-instance administration. Automation of error and resource alerts. Configuration of notifications for failures.

topItems.title: Configure automatic deployment for Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure Resource Manager templates for deploying Azure SQL resources.

topItems.title: Schedule tasks using SQL Server Agent
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for scheduled tasks and automatic alerts for SQL Server and Managed Instance. Configure extended event sessions for tracing activities.

topItems.title: Manage Azure PaaS resources using automated methods
topItems.excerpt: Explore SQL automation for Azure SQL Database and Open Source databases. Configure elastic jobs and Azure Policy.
